tool_description: This tool allows users to filter out bot traffic, customize content based on the visitor's location, display full country names, and perform bulk IP geolocation.

api_list.name: JSON endpoint
api_list.description: Provides detailed geolocation information for a specified IP address or the current IP address if none is provided.

optional_parameters.name: ip
optional_parameters.description: {ip} can be an IPv4 or IPv6 address, or left empty to use the current IP address.
